title: Ord Minnett hires senior sales trader
text:
Stockbroker Ord Minnett has moved to step up its presence in Melbourne's institutional market, hiring former RBC Capital Markets' senior trader Scott Ramsay.

Street Talk understands Ramsay will join Ords on Monday after more than five years as a director, head of institutional sales at RBC in Melbourne. Prior to that, he held institutional sales positions at CIMB, Deutsche Bank and UBS.

Ords in Melbourne has lured a senior sales specialist in the resources and technology sectors. AFR

Ramsay is a resources and technology research sales specialist with deep relationships in Melbourne, sources said. His appointment rounds out Ords' emerging companies sales team to 10 staff across Hong Kong, Melbourne and Sydney.

Ramsay is expected to work closely with mining analyst Dylan Kelly, who jumped ship to Ord Minnett in May after a six-and-a-half year career at CLSA.
